projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Static Website Hosting on S3 + CloudFront (AWS)
projects.bodyText:
- Deployed a static portfolio website on AWS **S3** with a custom domain using **Route 53** and enabled global CDN via CloudFront. 
 - Configured SSL/TLS using AWS Certificate Manager and implemented fine-grained IAM access..
 - Deployed on **AWS**.

projects.title: CI/CD Pipeline with Jenkins + AWS
projects.bodyText:
- implemented a CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins to automatically build and deploy a Dockerized application to AWS EC2 (or Elastic Beanstalk).
 - Integrated testing and linting in the pipeline.

projects.title: Cloud Monitoring & Alerting Setup
projects.bodyText: - Created a real-time monitoring dashboard using Amazon CloudWatch for an EC2 instance and configured custom alerts for CPU usage and application errors.
